net.fathomsoft.nova.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.fathomsoft.nova.util.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for File operations, such as: reading, writing, and manipulating file extensions.
    Since:
    v0.1 Jan 19, 2014 at 1:51:23 AM
    Version:
    v0.2 Apr 5, 2014 at 3:32:39 PM
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String readFile(java.io.File file)
      Read the contents of a File instance and return the contents in a String instance.
      static java.lang.String removeFileExtension(java.lang.String filename)
      Remove the extension from a file name.

      For example: An input of "file.txt" would return "file"
      static java.io.File writeFile(java.lang.String fileName, java.io.File parentDir, java.lang.String source)
      Write the given 'source' text to the file at the specified location.
      static java.io.File writeFile(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String source)
      Write the given 'source' text to a new file created in the current working directory.

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(java.io.File file)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Read the contents of a File instance and return the contents in a String instance.
        Parameters:
        file - The File to read from.
        Returns:
        The contents of the File.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there was an error reading from the file.

      • writeFile

        public static java.io.File writeFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     java.lang.String source)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Write the given 'source' text to a new file created in the current working directory.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to write the contents in.
        source - The contents to write into the new file.
        Returns:
        The newly written File instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an error writing the file.

      • writeFile

        public static java.io.File writeFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     java.io.File parentDir,
                                     java.lang.String source)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Write the given 'source' text to the file at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to write the contents in.
        parentDir - The directory to write the file inside of.
        source - The contents to write into the new file.
        Returns:
        The newly written File instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an error writing the file.

      • removeFileExtension

        public static java.lang.String removeFileExtension(java.lang.String filename)
        Remove the extension from a file name.

        For example: An input of "file.txt" would return "file"
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to remove the extension of.
        Returns:
        The filename without an extension.
